artist: Artist: Attributed to Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri)
description: recto: sketch of seated muscular man, with long curly hair and long white beard; head turned toward left, looking upward; PR arm across body, holding book (?) on table at right; drapery across lap; verso: curvilinear lines, script?
inscription:
Inscription

Verso, BC, in pen and brown ink: [dal Guercino]
medium: Black and white chalk on gray paper
provenance: Sale, Christie's, London, July 6, 1982, no. 39, for £2,200, to Richard Day; [Richard Day, London, until 1983; sold July 8, for £4,500, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1983-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Study of a Male Saint Writing
